Name: Allowing for an electronic signature for persons who contest a parking ticket online.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing for an electronic signature for persons who contest a parking ticket online.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Subdivision a of Section 19-203 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to read as follows:
 	§19-203  Functions, powers and duties of the parking violations bureau. The parking violations bureau shall have the following functions, powers and duties: 
    	a.  To accept pleas to, and to hear and determine, charges of parking violations; provided that where proceedings regarding parking violations are considered online, the proceedings must allow for the use of an electronic signature for persons who contest a parking ticket;
§ 2.  This local law shall take effect sixty days after its enactment into law.


LS#1996
BBB
3/30/2011
